Action.author: seanbohan_sovrin
Action.body: Can this get us to the replacement for Indy 1093? ~andkononykhin ?

Action.author: andkononykhin
Action.body: Yes, I think. Actually INDY-1087 made this task done. But I'm not sure about "agent-to-agent functions" mentioned in INDY-1093. ~ashcherbakov what do you think?

Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: I believe it can be replaced by INDY-1093 (or https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/INDY-1085 which is a design for this)
